title: Walk a Crooked Mile (restored, colorized, with intro and outro commentary) (1948, crime, imdb score: 6.3)

sources.title: Walk a Crooked Mile (restored, colorized, with intro and outro commentary) (1948, crime, imdb score: 6.3)
sources.description: Walk a Crooked Mile is a 1948 American Cold War crime film , directed by Gordon Douglas , starring Dennis O'Keefe and Louis Hayward .
